snippet.title: Thom Confronts The Grand Wizard of the KKK

localized.description: Richard Preston, Confederate White Knights, joins Thom Hartmann. The right has new ally in its fight against Obamacare - the Klu Klux Klan. Yes - that Klu Klux Klan. The Imperial Wizard of the Confederate White Knights will join us in studio later on in the show to explain why his group opposes Obamacare and wants to impeach the president. Why is President Obama an illegal president? Is it just because he's Black?
